文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_033_chunk5
证据片段: Iodine solutions in organic solvents fall into two groups. First, those which, like iodine vapor at room temperature, cause crack propagation in double cantilever beam (DCB) specimens but do not initiate cracks in smooth specimens.

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_033_chunk5
证据片段: First, those which, like iodine vapor at room temperature, cause crack propagation in double cantilever beam (DCB) specimens but do not initiate cracks in smooth specimens.

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_033_chunk5
证据片段: A second group of solvents (alcohols) both initiate cracking in smooth specimens and cause crack propagation in DCB specimens.

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_033_chunk5
证据片段: A second group of solvents (alcohols) both initiate cracking in smooth specimens and cause crack propagation in DCB specimens.

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_033_chunk5
证据片段: In addition to these two groups there are a few solvents in which neither crack propagation in DCB specimens nor cracking of smooth specimens occur

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_033_chunk5
证据片段: In addition to these two groups there are a few solvents in which neither crack propagation in DCB specimens nor cracking of smooth specimens occur

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_033_chunk5
证据片段: Modifications to the chemistry of the system by additives were effective only for arsenite and N2O additions to alcoholic solvents. In both instances times to failure were increased.
介质: alcoholic solvents with arsenite or N2O
